flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I love the look of a vintage rotary phone and had a couple of them lying around begging to be brought back to life. In a fit of inspiration, I decided to marry form and function. Thus the Retro Phone Phone Charging Station is born.
guide.introduction_rendered: I love the look of a vintage rotary phone and had a couple of them lying around begging to be brought back to life. In a fit of inspiration, I decided to marry form and function. Thus the Retro Phone Phone Charging Station is born.
guide.summary: Turn an old rotary or push button phone into a cell phone (or other USB device) charging station.
guide.title: Retro Phone Phone Charger
